trends: There have been 45 other sightings in Long Beach
There were no other sightings in Long Beach on or around July 29th 2012
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting detailsi was stepping outside of my house for a cigarette, when i looked up in the sky as i usually do to observe the stars, when i noticed a bright red light 70 degrees above the western horizon. i initially thought the object was mars due to the reddish\orange color, but soon realized it was too bright to be a planetary object. the object hovered for about 30 seconds, then made a smooth repeating 90 degree motion back and forth from the point of original visual contact. it began to randomly flicker like a flame, and eventually came to a full stop, and finally dimming completely dark until no longer visible. i was awestruck at the sight, being as i frequently stargaze when weather conditions permit, but i was not shocked due to this being my second sighting since i was a young adult (15 years ago).
Summary: Object flickered like a flame, hovered, did 90 degree turns starting and stopping.
